plot: A movie telling the story of three strangers that come to the same bar to deal with their problems. The one thing that ties them together is a woman that comes to help them overcome their hardships.
title: The Bar
plot_es: A movie telling the story of three strangers that come to the same bar to deal with their problems. The one thing that ties them together is a woman that comes to help them overcome their hardships.
plot_en: A movie telling the story of three strangers that come to the same bar to deal with their problems. The one thing that ties them together is a woman that comes to help them overcome their hardships.
